column1: # "highlights" remix - contains a selection of packages that provide new functionality:
#   - highlights of packages that are completely original to unilib
#   - packages derived from mods by the same author
#   - packages from other mods, which have been heavily modified and/or given new functionality
# This remix omits packages from the "gaia" and "hades" remixes, which are mostly original to unilib
# This remix also omits chat command packages, which are appear in the "chat" remix
# For a more complete list of packages original to unilib, see the "unilib" remix
